Description: Historical Account Identifier. Unique ID for historical accounts.
Name of the Account Holder during the historical period.
Account Category during the historical era (e.g., Savings, Checking).
Balance of the Account during the historical time frame.
Date when the Account was opened historically.
Date of the Last Transaction during the historical period.
Historical Branch Location Code where the account was held.
Historical Account Status (e.g., Active, Closed) during the past.
Historical Annual Interest Rate on the account.
Historical Overdraft Flag indicating overdraft availability.
Maximum Overdraft Limit historically allowed on the account.
Amount of Last Deposit historically recorded.
Amount of Last Withdrawal during the historical period.
Amount of Last Charged Fees historically on the account.
Amount of Last Accrued Interest historically on the account.
Address of the Account Holder during historical times.
Contact Number of the Account Holder in the historical context.
Email Address of the Account Holder historically.
Name of the Account Holder's Employer in the past.
Employment Status (e.g., Employed, Unemployed) historically.
Historical Credit Score of the Account Holder.
Historical Daily Transaction Limit on the account.
Summary of Recent Transactions historically on the account.
Historical Debit Card Issued Status on the account.
Historical Credit Card Issued Status on the account.
Historical Loan Status (if applicable) on the account.
Historical Approved Loan Amount (if applicable) on the account.
Historical Loan Interest Rate (if applicable) on the account.
Historical Loan Maturity Date (if applicable) on the account.
Historical Insurance Coverage Status on the account.
Historical Preferred Communication Method (e.g., Email, Phone).
Historical Marketing Opt-in Status on the account.
Date of Last Customer Contact historically.
Historical Source of Customer Lead (e.g., Referral, Advertisement).
Historical Customer Segment (e.g., Retail, Business).
Historical Relationship Manager's Name.
Historical Date of Lead Conversion (to Account).
Historical Description of Account Type.
Historical Currency of the Account.
Historical Subtype of the Account.
Name of Historical Joint Account Holder.
Historical Frequency of Account Statements.
Historical New Transaction Limit on the account.
Historical Online Banking Access Status on the account.
Historical Cheque Book Issued Status on the account.
